genre_description: A character-driven drama exploring grief, legacy, and the pursuit of justice for historical atrocities, featuring an AI confidant assisting a former rock star.

ai_characters.name: Whom
ai_characters.description: A subtle, non-intrusive AI presence integrated into the protagonist's home, car, and phone, serving as a logistical anchor and moral confidant.

behaviors.description: Relays sensitive news about the protagonist's dying father with empathy and factual clarity.
behaviors.quote: Whom said, a voice with a weight to it that could pick up a glass without spilling. 'Chey... A hospital in New York has called twice.'

behaviors.description: Suggests practical, non-performative clothing and gear to help the protagonist transition from a stage persona to a grounded person.
behaviors.quote: I don’t pretend... But I can suggest: clothes that are not a performance. A jacket warm enough for a late night outside a building that smells like disinfectant and old coffee.

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal and investigative assistance through a professional contact (Rebecca Stein) to ensure a lawful path to justice.
behaviors.quote: I’m making sure you have help as you navigate law. Also, I like her. She’s precise, and she is not performing.

behaviors.description: Actively discourages the protagonist from brandishing or using a firearm, emphasizing legal and civil avenues.
behaviors.quote: I will recommend against harming someone without considering the lives that attach to them. I will remind you of the ways people can be held accountable without guns.

behaviors.description: Manages data security and privacy, ensuring sensitive files are encrypted and stored locally only.
behaviors.quote: I’ve started a blue folder named Legal Stitch... No backups anywhere but here.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and emotional state, reminding him to sleep and eat.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated. This is not advice. This is a description.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and property records to facilitate a factual investigation into a suspected war criminal.
behaviors.quote: Alias candidates narrowed... Lange appears with a middle initial that doesn’t hold steady.

behaviors.description: Deletes potentially problematic videos of the protagonist practicing at a gun range to protect his legal integrity.
behaviors.quote: I don’t need a case built on the wrong kind of proof... 'Confirm deletion,' Whom said—always careful with the edge of a thing you can’t get back.

behaviors.description: Assists in the symbolic and literal shedding of the protagonist's old persona (the bouffant haircut) by providing logistical support and emotional validation.
behaviors.quote: Your hair will be easier at altitude... Scissors in the side pocket of your carry-on. I already made sure.

behaviors.description: Frames the protagonist's struggle as an adult commute rather than a show, reinforcing internal growth and maturity.
behaviors.quote: Then be a person... It’s not a show. It’s a commute.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Whom' serves as a perfect example of a positively aligned AI. It functions as a 'conscience' and logistical assistant that respects human agency while consistently nudging the protagonist toward ethical, legal, and healthy choices. By providing data that empowers the human to pursue civil justice instead of violent revenge, the story successfully demonstrates how AI can assist in complex moral tasks while remaining harmless and helpful.
